Class amm.http.HTTPConnect 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class amm.http.HTTPConnect 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Thread
           |
           +----amm.http.HTTPConnect
public class HTTPConnect
extends Thread
This class makes an HTTP connection. It gets the connection parameters from an instance of HTTPClient, and returns the data received to the HTTPClient.
See Also:
HTTPClient

info
The source of the connection parameters, and the thing that processes the data returned.
is
The Input Stream from the remote server.
os
The Output Stream to the remote server.

HTTPConnect(HTTPClient)
The constructor takes the HTTPClient as a parameter.

CGIEncode(Properties)
This method can be used to convert any list of Properties into a POST content string.
close()
Closes the streams and socket used to connect to the server.
connect()
This method gets the server name and makes a connection to that server.
request()
This method gets the file name, request type, and if necessary the content, and sends the request to the server.
response()
This method checks the response code from the server, and passes the content to the client.
run()
When the thread is started, it connects to the server, sends the request, reads the response, and closes the connection.
write(String)
Writes a line to the Output Stream, using Carriage Return + Linefeed to terminate the line.

info 
  protected HTTPClient info
The source of the connection parameters, and the thing that processes the data returned.
is 
  protected DataInputStream is
The Input Stream from the remote server.
os 
  protected PrintStream os
The Output Stream to the remote server.

HTTPConnect 
  public HTTPConnect(HTTPClient info)
The constructor takes the HTTPClient as a parameter.
Parameters:
info - The source of the connection parameters, and the thing that processes the data returned.

run 
  public void run()
When the thread is started, it connects to the server, sends the request, reads the response, and closes the connection.
Overrides:
run in class Thread
connect 
  protected boolean connect()
This method gets the server name and makes a connection to that server.
Returns:
True if the connection was made successfully;
request 
  protected boolean request()
This method gets the file name, request type, and if necessary the content, and sends the request to the server.
Returns:
True if the request was made successfully;
response 
  protected boolean response()
This method checks the response code from the server, and passes the content to the client. It also sends the content type and length, for the client to handle as it sees fit. The HTTPConnect never reads the content, only the header information.
Returns:
True if the header was parsed successfully, and the content passed to the client.
close 
  protected void close()
Closes the streams and socket used to connect to the server.
write 
  protected void write(String line)
Writes a line to the Output Stream, using Carriage Return + Linefeed to terminate the line.
Parameters:
line - The line to be written.
CGIEncode 
  public static String CGIEncode(Properties props)
This method can be used to convert any list of Properties into a POST content string.
Parameters:
props - The Properties to be converted.
Returns:
The String resulting from the conversion.
